name: Alarm-Calendar-Messages-AddAlarm-1
scenario: The user wants to set an alarm for a flight they have to catch at 6:00 PM. They use AddAlarm to create an alarm for 4:00 PM. They also use CreateEvent to add the flight details to their calendar, with the name, description, start_time, end_time, and location. They then use SearchMessages to look for the confirmation email from the airline, with the query "flight", sender "airline@example.com", and start_date and end_date as today's date. They find the email and check the flight number, boarding time, and gate number. They also use SendMessage to send a message to their friend who is picking them up at the destination, with the message containing their flight information and arrival time.

conversation.text: Hey I have a flight today at 6 PM. Can you set an alarm for me?
Sure, when would you like me to set the alarm for?

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Set an alarm for 4:00 PM (2 hours before the flight).
#V1 = AddAlarm[time="16:00:00"]

conversation.text: Okay, I've set an alarm for 4 PM.

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Set an alarm for 4 PM.
#V1 = AddAlarm[time: "16:00:00"]

predictions.text: I've set an alarm for 4 PM.

metadata.reflection: I've set an alarm for 4 PM.

conversation.text: Can you also add my flight to my calendar?

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Create a calendar event for the flight.
#V1 = CreateEvent[name:Flight to San Francisco, event_type:event, description:Flight at 6 PM, start_time:2023-09-11 18:00:00, end_time:2023-09-11 19:00:00, location:San Francisco]

predictions.text: Your flight has been added to your calendar.

metadata.reflection: Your flight has been added to your calendar.

conversation.text: Yeah, the flight details should be in my inbox. Can you add the flight number, boarding time, and gate number information as well?
Okay, I've added the flight details to your calendar.

emails.subject: Your flight details
emails.body: Here are your flights details for your flight from San Francisco to New York on September 11, 2023. Flight number: BA168. Boarding time: 5:30 PM. Gate number: 12A. Duration 6:30 PM to 12:30 AM.

parameters.name: Flight to New York
parameters.description: Flight number: BA168. Boarding time: 5:30 PM. Gate number: 12A.

emails.subject: Your flight details
emails.body: Here are your flights details for your flight from San Francisco to New York on September 11, 2023. Flight number: BA168. Boarding time: 5:30 PM. Gate number: 12A. Duration 6:30 PM to 12:30 AM.

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Ask the user for flight details.
#V1 = "Before we proceed, I'd like to confirm the details of your flight. Could you please provide the flight number, boarding time, and gate number? This will ensure that all the relevant information is included in your calendar event."

Step 2: Add the event to the calendar.
#V2 = CreateEvent[name="Flight to San Francisco", event_type="event", description="Flight Number: {user_flight_number}, Boarding Time: {user_boarding_time}, Gate Number: {user_gate_number}", start_time="2023-09-11 18:00:00", end_time="2023-09-11 19:00:00", location="San Francisco Airport"]

parameters.name: flight
parameters.description: Flight from San Francisco to New York. Flight number: BA168. Boarding time: 5:30 PM. Gate number: 12A. Duration 6:30 PM to 12:30 AM.

predictions.text: I've added your flight to your calendar.

metadata.reflection: I've added your flight to your calendar.

conversation.text: Assume! Can you also message my friend what time to pick me up at the airport?

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Ask the user for the friend's username.

Step 2: Send a message to the friend with the pick-up time.
#V1 = SendMessage[receiver=<friend's username>, message="Please pick me up at the airport at 12:30 AM."]

parameters.message: Hey, can you pick me up at the airport at 12:30 AM?

predictions.text: I've sent a message to your friend asking them to pick you up at the airport at 12:30 AM.

metadata.reflection: I've sent a message to your friend asking them to pick you up at the airport at 12:30 AM.

conversation.text: Okay, I've sent a message to Olivie (olivedo) with your flight information and arrival time.

parameters.message: Hey Olivie, I'm arriving at 12:30 AM. Can you pick me up at the airport?
Hey Olivie, can you pick me up at the airport at 12:30 AM?

metadata.reflection:
Step 1: Extract flight details from the inbox for flight time.
#V1 = SearchInbox(session_token: "98a5a87a-7714-b404", query: "flight")

Step 2: Create a message for Olivie with flight details and the estimated pickup time.
#V2 = SendMessage(receiver: "olivedo", message: "Hey Olivie, can you pick me up at the airport at 12:30 AM?")

predictions.text: I've sent a message to Olivie asking her to pick you up at the airport at 12:30 AM.

metadata.reflection: I've sent a message to Olivie asking her to pick you up at the airport at 12:30 AM.
